text: It's honestly just exhausting to try to stay "responsible" with our own data on the internet. The tradeoffs don't always feel worth it, and I say that as a pretty techy dude who self-hosts a bunch of stuff. It's even harder to convince non-techy people like my family to move away from convenience.

I mean the issue I have is not that I don't value privacy, but I value the connectivity with others more than my own privacy. If the other party I communicate also shares this view, a transition to another platform can be arranged.
